Getting Started Edit

Welcome to my API.

This API document is designed for those interested in improving my platform.

This API is still under progress and will evolve.

You’ll succeed if you do this.

Here’s some useful information.

Something may not happen if you try and do this.

Something bad will happen if you do this.

Authentication Edit

You need to be authenticated for all API requests. You can generate an example for API.

Add the API key to all requests as a GET parameter.

If you include this API key, it will work.

 $.get("http://api.myapp.com/movies/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
   alert(data);
 });

 curl http://api.myapp.com/movies?token=YOUR_APP_KEY

Errors Edit

Code Name Description
200 OK Success
201 Created Creation Successful
400 Bad Request We could not process that action
403 Forbidden We couldn’t authenticate you
202 Accepted Accept for processing
401 Unauthorized Require user authentication

All errors will return JSON in the following format:

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "error message here"
}

/movies Edit

List all movies

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of movies returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 movies

Lists all the photos you have access to. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.myapp.com/movies/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.myapp.com/movies/", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.myapp.com/movies?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://sampleapi.readme.com/orders?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "The Hunger Games",
    "score": 4.5,
    "dateAdded": "12/12/2013"
  },
  {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "The Hunger Games",
    "score": 4.7,
    "dateAdded": "15/12/2013"
  },
]

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid offset"
}

/movies Edit

Create Movie

Parameters
title
The title for the movie
score
The movie's score between 0 and 10

The movie will automatically be added to your list

Adds a movie to your collection.

$.post("http://api.myapp.com/movies/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "title": "Match Point",
  "score": 4.3
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "Match Point",
  "score": 4.3,
  "dateAdded": "5/1/2015"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid score"
}

/movies/:id Edit

Get Movie

Returns a specific movie from your collection

$.get("http://api.myapp.com/movies/3", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "Match Point",
  "score": 4.3,
  "dateAdded": "5/1/2015"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Movie doesn't exist"
}

/movies/:id Edit

Update movie

Parameters
title
The title for the movie
score
The movie's score between 0 and 10

Update an existing movie in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/movies/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "score": 5.0,
    "title": "Joker"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "Joker",
  "score": 5,
  "dateAdded": "5/1/2015"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Movie doesn't exist"
}

/movies/:id Edit

Deletes a movie

Deletes a movie in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/movies/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Movie doesn't exist"
}
